column4: hola.  can anyone tell me how to make the Dapper CD run in LiveCD mode even though I have a hard disk installed?  (The HD has a broken grub and won't currently mount)
it boots from CD just fine, but starting Ubuntu *always* attempts to load the installation on the hard drisk
disconnecting the hard disk gets the livecd booting, but I want to fix the hard disk so that's no good
